metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14929 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Alpine before 2.23 silently proceeds to use an insecure connection after a/tls is sent in certain circumstances involving PREAUTH, which is a lesssecure behavior than the alternative of closing the connection and lettingthe user decide what they would like to do.

criterions.comment: alpine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
